idea-plugin.name: TagMyCode
idea-plugin.description:
Provides the support for TagMyCode.
This plugin allows you to manage your own snippets.

Features:
* Add snippets: you can save your code snippets including description, language, and tags
* List snippets (CRUD): snippets are stored locally and you can filter, sort, create, modify, edit or delete them directly from the IDE * Quick search: you can search your snippets and insert them directly into the document
